TopicTitle: Serious props on the performance improvements!

Articles.Content:
Playing at 4k with a 3070 is comfortable.

I'm getting 60 fps with the planet in view: major upgrade from March/April (when I last played).

The clouds, planetary artwork in general - everything - folks at IG: thanks!

... actually - the whole point is... I'm playing again.  

Thanks
Yes, it's a vast improvement.

Seriously, team...

Falling into Kerbin (now) with all the improvements and FPS is FREAKING BEAUTIFUL!

(Returning from Mun... and my Kerbals are seriously glad to be going home.)

Artwork and performance is great!
After replacing my cpu cooler i play again with 40-60+  fps, with medium graphics and high cloud setting, it is very good i think.
Hear, hear. Ive been checking out the fs update, and its running much better than it was. Still get a few hiccups here and there, but again its much better.
After a 120 hour campaign and probably 30-40 craft all over the Kerbol system it's really starting to slow down.. especially when time warping.

30 minutes ago, Vl3d said:

After a 120 hour campaign and probably 30-40 craft all over the Kerbol system it's really starting to slow down.. especially when time warping.

I'm noticing a similar pattern. My cpu doesn't seem to like maneuver nodes going through multiple spheres of influence either
